tasks.title: Setup React SPA with Vite
tasks.description: Initialize a React Single Page Application using Vite as the build tool.
tasks.details: Use Vite to create a new React project. Ensure the project is set up with TypeScript support. Install necessary dependencies such as React, React-DOM, and Tailwind CSS for styling.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the application builds and runs successfully with a basic React component rendering.

tasks.title: Integrate Monaco Editor
tasks.description: Integrate Monaco Editor into the React application for code editing capabilities.
tasks.details: Install @monaco-editor/react package. Create a component to render the Monaco Editor. Configure the editor for syntax highlighting and line numbers. Implement event listeners for selection changes using `onDidChangeCursorSelection`.
tasks.testStrategy: Test by pasting code into the editor and verifying syntax highlighting and line number display. Ensure selection events update the application state.

tasks.title: Implement AI Interaction Mechanism
tasks.description: Develop a mechanism to interact with AI APIs for code review suggestions.
tasks.details: Set up a function to package selected code, surrounding context, and user prompts. Use OpenAI SDK or a mock service to send requests. Implement a floating 'Ask AI' button that triggers the API call.
tasks.testStrategy: Mock API responses and verify that the AI's response references specific variables in the selected code block.

subtasks.title: Set Up API Interaction Function
subtasks.description: Develop a function to package code, context, and prompts for API requests.
subtasks.details: Create a function that collects selected code, its surrounding context, and user prompts. Use OpenAI SDK or a mock service to format and send requests.
subtasks.testStrategy: Mock API responses to ensure correct packaging and sending of requests.

subtasks.title: Implement 'Ask AI' Floating Button
subtasks.description: Create a UI button to trigger AI API calls.
subtasks.details: Design and implement a floating 'Ask AI' button. Ensure it is accessible and triggers the API interaction function when clicked.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify button visibility and functionality, ensuring it triggers the API call.

subtasks.title: Handle API Responses
subtasks.description: Develop logic to process and display AI API responses.
subtasks.details: Implement a handler for API responses to parse and display suggestions. Ensure error handling and loading states are managed.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with mock responses to ensure correct parsing and display of AI suggestions.

tasks.title: Develop Thread Management System
tasks.description: Create a system to manage conversation threads anchored to specific code lines.
tasks.details: Use Zustand for global state management. Implement a data model to store threads with line ranges and messages. Display visual indicators for threads in the editor gutter.
tasks.testStrategy: Create multiple threads and verify they are correctly anchored to the specified line ranges. Ensure clicking a thread indicator opens the correct chat history.

subtasks.title: Set Up Zustand for Global State Management
subtasks.description: Initialize Zustand to manage global state for conversation threads.
subtasks.details: Install Zustand and create a store to manage thread states. Define actions for adding, updating, and removing threads.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify state updates correctly when threads are added or removed.

subtasks.title: Implement Data Model for Threads
subtasks.description: Create a data model to store conversation threads with line ranges and messages.
subtasks.details: Design a schema to represent threads, including properties for line range, messages, and metadata. Integrate with Zustand store.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test data model by creating sample threads and checking data integrity.

subtasks.title: Integrate UI for Thread Indicators
subtasks.description: Develop UI components to display thread indicators in the editor gutter.
subtasks.details: Use React to create visual indicators for threads. Ensure indicators are positioned correctly based on line ranges.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that indicators appear at correct lines and respond to user interactions.

subtasks.title: Conduct Comprehensive Testing
subtasks.description: Perform testing to ensure the thread management system functions correctly.
subtasks.details: Create test cases for adding, updating, and removing threads. Verify UI updates and state consistency.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use automated tests to simulate user actions and validate system behavior.

tasks.title: Implement Application State Persistence
tasks.description: Persist application state using localStorage to maintain state across page reloads.
tasks.details: Serialize the current code and conversation threads to localStorage. On application load, deserialize and restore the state. Ensure state updates trigger localStorage updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Reload the page and verify that the code and threads are restored correctly from localStorage.

tasks.title: Design User Interface with Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Design and style the user interface using Tailwind CSS for rapid development.
tasks.details: Create a responsive layout for the editor and thread management components. Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling. Ensure the UI is intuitive and accessible.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform UI testing to ensure components are styled correctly and the layout is responsive across different screen sizes.

tasks.title: Implement Contextual AI Response Display
tasks.description: Display AI responses inline or visually connected to the code for context retention.
tasks.details: Develop a component to display AI responses next to the relevant code block. Ensure responses are visually connected to the code to maintain context. Implement loading states for AI responses.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that AI responses appear correctly next to the code block and that loading indicators are displayed during API calls.

tasks.title: Develop Smart Selection and Context Menu
tasks.description: Implement smart selection features and a context menu for code interactions.
tasks.details: Enable right-click context menu with options like 'Ask AI about this'. Implement smart selection features such as expanding selection to logical boundaries. Use Monaco's default selection behaviors for word and line selection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the context menu appearance and functionality. Verify that smart selection correctly identifies function boundaries.

subtasks.title: Implement Context Menu with AI Options
subtasks.description: Develop a right-click context menu with options like 'Ask AI about this'.
subtasks.details: Create a context menu that appears on right-click, integrating options such as 'Ask AI about this'. Ensure compatibility with Monaco Editor's existing context menu.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the context menu appears on right-click and options are selectable.

subtasks.title: Develop Smart Selection Logic
subtasks.description: Implement smart selection features to expand selection to logical boundaries.
subtasks.details: Use Monaco's default selection behaviors to enhance selection logic. Implement functionality to expand selection to logical code boundaries, such as functions or blocks.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test selection expansion to ensure it correctly identifies and selects logical code boundaries.

subtasks.title: Test Context Menu and Smart Selection Features
subtasks.description: Conduct testing for the context menu and smart selection features.
subtasks.details: Perform comprehensive testing to ensure the context menu functions correctly and smart selection logic works as intended. Include edge cases and compatibility checks with Monaco Editor.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test both features in various scenarios to ensure reliability and accuracy.

tasks.title: Implement Keyboard Shortcuts
tasks.description: Add keyboard shortcuts for power user features and improved accessibility.
tasks.details: Implement shortcuts such as `Cmd/Ctrl+K` to open AI dialog, `Escape` to close modals, and `Cmd/Ctrl+Enter` to submit prompts. Ensure shortcuts are discoverable with tooltips.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all keyboard shortcuts to ensure they trigger the correct actions and improve user workflow efficiency.

tasks.title: Setup AI Provider Configuration
tasks.description: Configure AI provider settings and allow switching between providers.
tasks.details: Create a settings panel for selecting AI providers and models. Implement API key input fields and a 'Test Connection' button. Store configuration in localStorage.
tasks.testStrategy: Test provider switching and API key validation. Ensure that the application can switch providers seamlessly and handle errors gracefully.
